name: Break the Conundrum
description:
Tired of low internet speeds! Thinking how to prepare for interviews? Look no further.

This desktop application helps you to practice and prepare for interviews in the popular UI interfaces of Zoom and Teams. Added to that, it has in-built set of questionnaires categorized according to the specialization. If you still run out of the questions, there is an option to create your own question pool.

Added to this, you can also simulate the bandwidth options to make yourself comfortable with all bandwidth speeds. Why wait?

Download and get started.
